website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive in both cost and feel, but perfect for the occasional poker player who is looking to add a little ambiance to their game.
pros: Has Texas Hold'em on one side, Blackjack on the other
Great price for a little poker atmosphere
Large enough to fit a good-sized table
cons: From the markings that trip up cards to the cheap felt, quality is not the best
Slips a bit on the table as well

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: We bought them for our charity fundraiser, they looked great and did not even have to tape them down. They are very sturdy and well designed. Only thing we had to do is iron them out a bit with a damp clean dish towel, due to shipping crunching. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Violet K

customer_reviews.title: Good product and value.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a poker night. Lay it out and mist with water the day before so it lays flat without seems. We did not do this and it was still fine just will do that the day before in the future. If you want a professional table stop being cheap and expecting the world. If you are just looking to zest up your poker night with friends this is a good easy way.
customer_reviews.author: JWP

customer_reviews.title: Not for the serious card players
customer_reviews.text: Very strange dimensions, and the paint is very thin and in some places crooked. I had to cut the mat down myself to make it appear more visually pleasing, and also tried to cut out some of the numerous folds and wrinkles. Would not recommend, unless you need it for a party/prop or just don't mind the cheap quality. Does not feel the least bit professional but for the price it kinda makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price, but graphics bled
customer_reviews.text: The good: Excellent price for an inexpensive, large poker table top. The cloth doesn't feel cheap and the cards slide off it very well. Yes, you may want to gently iron it or spray water on it. It's quite wrinkled because it's folded very tightly and compact. I would recommend a towel between a warm iron and the felt so you don't melt the graphics. The bad: There were imprints from the iron-on graphics on the mirror folded sides (see first picture). So either they folded it before the graphics were cool, or it had been exposed to heat (while folded) at some point. The Blackjack side is now disfigured. :(
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly & great quality. We used this as a decoration for a casino themed party set up on a large table with various good Hold'em card hands on each spot. Then we covered the whole thing up with a clear table cover to protect the mat & cards from spills. It will be fun though for future parties to actually use for playing cards.
customer_reviews.author: Gusmom

customer_reviews.title: The Good, Bad, and Overall...
customer_reviews.text: The Good: Nice heavy gauge felt. Price makes this a disposable item if necessary. Large. The Bad: It's felt. Heavy felt but felt just the same. Arrives folded so there are creases and takes time to lay flat. Overall: The price makes it very cost-effective. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Animated Puppets

customer_reviews.title: I bought this durable felt table cover for the blackjack ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this durable felt table cover for the blackjack print. I threw it in the dryer with a damp cloth to remove the majority of wrinkles. I adhered it to the table with removable poster tape. Then, I cut the felt to the shape of the table top. The price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: HappyInMyGarden

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but must improve the material
customer_reviews.text: I loved it for the first 2-3 days ( because it was just for heads up playing with my friend ) but after 3 days the green stuff starts to go everywhere ( even in your eyes & mouth ) in my car , in my house EVERYWHERE . But I understand you get to what you pay for ! So don’t mind ( not shocked )
customer_reviews.author: Moses Delbridge

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to buying a bulky card table
customer_reviews.text: The table felt fit perfectly over my dining table. It arrives folded so, you'll have to lay it out for the creases to smooth out. I woild recommend rolling it up when storing to prevent the creaees. Lastly, I recommend taping the ends down to prevent the felt from sliding off the table.
customer_reviews.author: Super Sig

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold up.  Use only as a stopgap until you can buy something better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and used it for Texas Holdem gatherings. It worked well for maybe 8 games but the felt got more and more rough after each use. Eventually the surface was so uneven that the cards wouldn't slide well and it looked bad. At that point I purchased an alternative (the Brybelly Sure Stick Rubber Foam Poker Table Top) which was about the same size and has held up much better. I recommend skipping the 2-sided felt product and going straight to a rubber-backed fabric alternative. But if you're in a pinch and just need -something- then this product will get you by for a few games.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Not the best game mat but will get there job done
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to host a casino night for my moms birthday. Mats nothing fancy but it got the job done. Mom had a great time playing cards with the guests. Will use it in the future if we have any more casino nights
customer_reviews.author: anna nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Just using these for fun at a large get together and it fits great on 6 foot folding tables (just slightly larger than the tabletop). The creases from being folded remain pretty predominant but it won’t interfere with our plans.
customer_reviews.author: TBits

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good piece!
customer_reviews.text: I am planning to use this for a casino theme birthday party, as we can’t go to the casino right now. It arrived in pretty good condition, this was one minor mark on the lettering - it appears to have gotten stuck together. But it’s minor, and can’t notice it too much. Otherwise it looks great, few wrinkles from being folded, but that’s expected. Sure I can smooth them out somehow. Overall pretty happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Fun purchase
customer_reviews.text: This Texas Holdem mat is great! it is reversible - Texas Holden on one side, Roulett on the other. We like to play Texas Holdem with family & friends & the mat also works well with Black Jack. Fun purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap
customer_reviews.text: Felt wasn't cut correctly. Very cheaply made. They cut as many corners as they could. Worked for what I was doing but I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Harv

customer_reviews.title: Not casino quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great price, was really looking that silky casino feel but this wasn't quite it. All in all it's a really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Noel V

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised at how nice these were when they showed up
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how nice these were when they showed up. Very fast shipping , very nice product. Was a great size and colors look great! Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Benedict

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for at a great price and will do the job I needed done! Delivery was super super fast and at my door step in no time!
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH WAGNER

customer_reviews.title: Neither too good nor too bad
customer_reviews.text: The quality and metirial only deserve 3 stars, not too bad, but cannot be a good item.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Material is quite dense/rigid, so as to not lay flat on a table. Additionally the felt is not smooth as you would expect from a game table and provides a lot of friction - so no sliding cards across the surface. Works in a pinch, but I will not be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: VCL001

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Black Jack side looks great Texas Hold'em doesn't look anything like the picture looks like it was made for a 3-foot table instead of a 6ft table
customer_reviews.author: trueaho "Charles"

customer_reviews.title: picture is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: width-wise the image is close to correct. But the length-wise the "card stations" are *Far* from the ends of the felt. making the effective length of the felt significantly shorter than its measurements. the picture of the item does not represent the reality.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Family game night
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Perfect for throwing on top of a table for family game night. Keep in mind its pretty long at 6', so you make sure that it will fit on your table. I also recommend getting some Velcro tape to keep it in place, as it has a tendency to slip off the table.
customer_reviews.author: JoshuaM

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly on my dining table and when I pull it out for poker nights people are like "whoaaa". It really lends that legi
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what it says it is. It fits perfectly on my dining table and when I pull it out for poker nights people are like "whoaaa". It really lends that legit feeling to your poker nights! Plus now chips won't be as loud clanging on my wood table to prevent my neighbors from hating me!!
customer_reviews.author: Mi Lam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome black jack and Texas hold'em table cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this table cover. I use it weekly and have had no issues with it. It is thick enough to allow aggressive betting i.e. throwing chips across the table and not make much noise or scratch the table. However, there are some fuzz balls that have appeared, but I have expected that since it is made of felt. I don't find that a problem, where others may. Overall, I would recommend this for anyone wanting to use a table they already have but don't want to scratch it or buy a card table.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Ricard

customer_reviews.title: Great Budget Option
customer_reviews.text: Poker tables go for upwards of 100-200 dollars. For just a fraction of the price you can get a very similar experience from your own table. Would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Peng

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Used for a casino night party. Heavy felt, glad we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great for casual games!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! A solid layout for Poker or Blackjack!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Phoolery

customer_reviews.title: a+
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase. The item was delivered on perfect condition and as described by the seller. I strongly Reccomended purchasing from them. A+ everything ! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Meh would would you expect from something like this? I kinda expected a functioning product and ...
customer_reviews.text: Meh would would you expect from something like this? I kinda expected a functioning product and not a fantastic one. Its a felt lining with some print on it. Some of it is graphed in the wrong areas as other reviewers mentioned. My smarter half made a really really good point. Why didn't I just go to JoAnns and buy a fabric felt top for 10x cheaper......The little card print outs are completely pointless, no ones going to want to use them. ill put the cards where I please. :) I bought this with the intention of just having a felt top, but overall the quality is just 3 stars and 'meh' overall.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Poker Mat was exactly what you would expect. Might ...
customer_reviews.text: Poker Mat was exactly what you would expect. Might need velcro or stick its to keep it down on a smooth surface, very thin felt material, but suited our needs for the game.
customer_reviews.author: T. Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for covering my folding tables and giving the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased three of these to host a Poker Tournament birthday party for my teenage son. Perfect size for covering my folding tables and giving the look of a casino. Add "dealers" with bow ties and poker chips, and you have ambiance!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well and Will Wash
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought it. The felt top is much more attractive to my blackjack "customers" than an empty table top. There will be felt lint coming up though, so that's annoying, but not game-breaking. Also, I just machine washed and dried it, and it seems fine. The lint didn't come off though. Now if only the felt didn't say "Dealer stands on ALL 17s", I could gain a 0.2% house edge by hitting my soft 17s.
customer_reviews.author: Nick R

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: not cut straight, had to be adjusted. quality at the lower end.
customer_reviews.author: Ulrich Krupp

customer_reviews.title: What you pay is what you get
customer_reviews.text: This item came at a very competitive price and I decided to get it because it was also two-sided. The felt is not very good quality and when you fold it it tends to get folding lines. Good if you want to just have fun with family or close friends, but I'd buy something of better quality if I wanted to use it for more formal gatherings.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: Good, but gets fuzz balls after a while
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a bad felt, but after a while it does get the annoying fuzz balls. I've been using mine for over a year now. I stapled itto a piece of plywood for my home-made blackjack table and use it pretty frequently. After about 10 - 15 uses you start to get the fuzz balls and they can get in the way of cards sliding freely on the felt which is annoying. In the future I will buy a higher quality felt, but for the price this really is a good deal, and a good starter felt for at-home play.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Musselman

customer_reviews.title: I had personalized playing cards made that told he we was going He loved it
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to suprise my boyfriend with a trip to vegas. I had personalized playing cards made that told he we was going He loved it
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great value for the cost!! Made a great night of family casino fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Thick felt. Love that it has blackjack on one side and Texas Holdem on the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Nor S

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This fits my table nicely and holds up really well to wear/tear
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what we wanted for a night of poker tournament with our neighbors :)
customer_reviews.author: Event Queen

customer_reviews.title: Your own poker room in less than 4 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied; even though it does get folded before delivery, you can easily iron it (i would advise just on 'wool' mode) without damaging it. It fit by table perfectly, i thought of using table hooks to keep it into position but then just switched to small pieces of tape. Its reusable and does not stain too hard. Very satisfied about smooth delivery too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: It is what it says. It easily covers a full size dinner table and looks pretty good though there was one place where the paint stuff had smeared or something but otherwise it's of good quality. Beware it comes folded up so it will take some time to get rid of the fold lines.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Don’t BUY!!! Terrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality lasted literally 1 week only and have to buy another item to relate: what a wast of money....
customer_reviews.author: Shereese C

customer_reviews.title: Texas Hold Em poker cover.
customer_reviews.text: I got this poker table cover but have not had an occasion yet to use it. Nice product and as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: The picture looks as if the mat printed incorrectly "stands ...
customer_reviews.text: The picture looks as if the mat printed incorrectly "stands on all 17,s" but when I received my order it was printed correctly "17's" otherwise it is exactly as I expected!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Casino Night
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to add to a casino themed party. We built tables and attached the felt with staples. It worked perfect, and was a much cheaper alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Droddy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. I might have to buy another one as a backup!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dad absolutely loved it to play and have fun
customer_reviews.text: My Dad absolutely loved it to play and have fun. Simple and good. I will buy more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: It works fine and is well worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The felt is thick and does not move around much. I find that the price was reasonable and I use it often as it adds to the ambience of the game until I go broke.
customer_reviews.author: Bread Basket

customer_reviews.title: Looks professional
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my playing set. If you don't lay every week this will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Zoller

customer_reviews.title: quality is fine
customer_reviews.text: its too small, I was hoping to be able to cover a table but this simply wont do, quality is fine
customer_reviews.author: Diego R.

customer_reviews.title: For the money it's good
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty thick felt. The printed letters/squares are clear. I had to iron it a few times to get the wrinkles from shipping out. For the money this was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: limecloud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a quick house game
customer_reviews.text: No one cares about what is displayed on this felt, what matters is that its felt. LOL. I mean, it makes a huge difference when dealing the cards. They actually stay on the table instead of flying off the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Simmons-Brusick

customer_reviews.title: Good felt
customer_reviews.text: After having poker night, I decided to purchase this dealer felt for poker night . I highly recommended this for anyone that need poker / Texas Holdem night
customer_reviews.author: mario west

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works just like it sayd, covers my full table, works for our game nights
customer_reviews.author: A. Burstein

customer_reviews.title: Creates the perfect table top game!
customer_reviews.text: Thick felt, created the perfect game atmosphere at a small price.
customer_reviews.author: steve fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Decent Felt
customer_reviews.text: As stated in previous reviews it comes folded up but the creases disappear upon rolling it up and out a couple times. However with light use I have noticed that the felt does tend to bundle up already. The cards tend to get caught up on them when dealing. This is a modest replacement to a real poker table but for light use it is acceptable. Also with the pricing it's not too bad if needed to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good product overall. But expected more from quality.
customer_reviews.text: The design and size is very nice. Fits my table perfectly. Would be nice if they took away the dealer box artwork on the poker side since you would think that most people use these for home games instead of running a casino. For the price I paid, I expected more out of the quality of the material. I noticed that the material frays quite easily. Got a lot of fur balls forming on the surface that can be pulled off. It lasted through the first night without problems. I have not yet put it thru the washer. Will update when I find out what happens.
customer_reviews.author: &nb.p

customer_reviews.title: WAS DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a gift, and thank goodness I opened it first. Had 2 quarter sized "spots" that were stiff and looked like the solvent used to clean the printing machine had dripped on the item. It bleed through both sides of the felt and ruined the printing on both sides. I am a great fan of Amazon, and order very often, but I sometimes get damaged goods. I wish they were better at quality control, both for themselves and their suppliers.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: the folds are a bit annoying if they rolled the fabric instead for delivery would ...
customer_reviews.text: the folds are a bit annoying if they rolled the fabric instead for delivery would be better, but it is still usable.
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: Having fun
customer_reviews.text: good matt, lots of fun and gives you 2 option of a card game.
customer_reviews.author: Tez

customer_reviews.title: Liked it
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband. He liked it. Works for parties and game night
customer_reviews.author: Kram

customer_reviews.title: It was nice out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It was nice out of the box... but the felt did degrade pretty quickly during the play of poker... 6 hours of poker and there was lots of green fuzz. I don't know if that's expected, but it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Male in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: I think it was a pretty good buy
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item. I got it for New Year's Eve for a Casino Night I'm planning. For the price, I think it was a pretty good buy. My only complaint is some smudged paint on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Fun and great price
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun. My children had a ball learning card games and using chips I bought separately. Something different for the kids but also fine for friendly adult card and table games.
customer_reviews.author: helping hand

customer_reviews.title: Casino Felt
customer_reviews.text: It is everything it promised it would be. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Billionaire Maker

customer_reviews.title: Poker felt stuck
customer_reviews.text: As son as I unfolded it, the outlines were stuck together and had to peel it off and basically ruined one side which was luckily the blackjack side. It' s alright if you'll need it for poker only but I wouldn't buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Price is Right
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and thickness to the cloth. for the amount we have used it over the past year and a half it has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: It's felt...whaddya want?
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. Cheap, quick shipping and it's a surface other than the dining room table to play on. If you play alot you can expect it to start getting little furballs. I think I would go without a pattern on the next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CBR

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Felt is not as good quality as expected. Excellent size though. Great price
customer_reviews.author: Lorinda Olivas

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: The felt is great when you first open it, but after playing an hour of poker the felt starts to lent up. Green pieces of felt are all over my house.
customer_reviews.author: RTR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Lays very flat and it is made of a very heavy felt. The colors and the feel are good. A very good value. A great deal at the price.
customer_reviews.author: SuLoco

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Easy to unfold and use
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what I excpected. Perfect! Easy to unfold and use, then fold/roll up and store.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: I have had a lot of family fun using these items
customer_reviews.author: DanEd55

customer_reviews.title: Casino Night a Blast
customer_reviews.text: Our Casino Night was a Blast Thanks to all of these Casino Equipment taht we acquired, Pur guests enjoyed having a casino fantasy Night
customer_reviews.author: Lenny M.

customer_reviews.title: Luckily our was fine and it was very helpful in making the cards ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried since some of the reviews said that it was shipped with some of the "paint" messed up. Luckily our was fine and it was very helpful in making the cards slide across the table. Of course someone has already spilled a drink on it. I think spot cleaning with semi soapy water should be fine, I wouldn't try to wash it, it would get destroyed in the wash. I was looking at other table tops that had cup holders and were made of hard wood, but were between 40-60 all the way up to 90 bucks. I'm glad I decided to just go with the covering.
customer_reviews.author: Val T.

customer_reviews.title: Casino Party
customer_reviews.text: We bought several items for my daughter's "Casino Night" party. These felts worked well for our purpose. I wouldn't call them high quality but they suited the need well. We used them on the kitchen table and a game table.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Da Vinci
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a birthday party I threw for my husband. He loved it, and we had a good time with it.
customer_reviews.author: co2chantel

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: very good the product has good quality and it is as described, it is a good product and i recomend it
customer_reviews.author: CSLG

customer_reviews.title: I've used it maybe 8 times and it's already pilling like crazy.
customer_reviews.text: It was cheap, but it hasn't held up well. I've used it maybe 8 times and it's already pilling like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Petosky

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked out perfect!! Has that great feel of the tables, and allows for that great card slide when dealing. Never moved on the table, like many other table toppers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For our casino equipment for my Lions club. Hope they last.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tremblay

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the best holdem mat in the world, but it isn't the most expensive either!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Moul

customer_reviews.title: it look very nice. I thought I was getting 2
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this yet, it look very nice. I thought I was getting 2. My mistake it say 2 sided.
customer_reviews.author: debra miller

customer_reviews.title: Casino felt
customer_reviews.text: I love this casino felt. We used it playing poker with 8 people and it gave that game a nice casino effect. The quality seemed good and we loved the low price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Katoch

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, ok material but you get what you paid for. Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: cotn_4

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not too fancy but gets the job done. It would be nice to have a betting line and the dealer box isn't too helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Knowwhentofoldem

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!!! I only bought one because we have a poker table top, but I think I might have to buy another one!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W.

customer_reviews.title: Poker table top
customer_reviews.text: Cheap in price and quality, but gets the job done. I didn't realize it was all fabric; I thought it was a hard surface. Instead it is fabric that comes folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Kinsey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This poker/blackjack felt was exactly what we needed. It was versatile enough to flip and use either side. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: christmasp

customer_reviews.title: Poker Night!
customer_reviews.text: Helps give poker night a better feel. No problems so far. Recommended for anyone who plays poker and is dealing on any table top.
customer_reviews.author: jl91701

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: feels good for its price, stayed in place all night, however pieces of the felt started to come loose but nice value for its price
customer_reviews.author: Aaron R. Rueda

customer_reviews.title: Poker made authentic..
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a table top or even pool table converted into a casino. Good appearance. Right price!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G

customer_reviews.title: pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the real deal. You can throw it over a table or build an actual table... I found free blueprints online.
customer_reviews.author: The Brains

customer_reviews.title: Looks fine we have been using it all the time - ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks fine we have been using it all the time - wonder how it behaves when we have to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: JW Tasking

customer_reviews.title: Half way there
customer_reviews.text: It was nice but only the black jack side was printed on it. we just flipped it over an used the blank side for other card games
customer_reviews.author: Burt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as we expected. Measure your dining table etc ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as we expected. Measure your dining table etc first to see how well its size will cover when it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this poker mat under the impression that it's dimensions were 36x72 inches. I have a fold out table that's 29x71 inches. This mat should've covered the entire area with extra material hanging from all sides. The mat I received was 36x70 inches. Two inches less than what I purchased. That might not seem like a big deal but now there's an area of table exposed. Not cool.
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good time. We will be using these for a conference session next month. All looks good so far!
customer_reviews.author: PegSigns
